meanings.definition: The process of forming a patina on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The patination of the statue gave it a beautiful green color.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the patination on the old copper roof created a unique look.
meanings.sent3: The patination on the metal door made it look like it was covered in moss!
meanings.sent4: The patination on the ancient artifact told a story of its long history.
meanings.sent5: I could see the patination on the metal changing with each passing year.

meanings.definition: The natural or artificial process of developing a greenish film on copper or bronze.
meanings.sent1: The patination on the copper pot made it look aged and elegant.
meanings.sent2: Artists often use chemicals to speed up the patination of bronze sculptures.
meanings.sent3: The patination on the statue made it seem like it was slowly turning into a tree.
meanings.sent4: The patination on the church bell gave it a mystical aura.
meanings.sent5: The patination on the ancient coins revealed their long burial underground.
